name: SensorFleet IDS Rule Manager
title: Management UI for Suricata IDS engine and Zeek security monitoring tool
description: Advanced features to be used on top of IDS engines, such as automatic ruleset updating, event stream viewer, etc.
data_retention_desc: Rule manager stores edit history of Suricata rules and history of user actions (edit, delete creation)

relations.description: Rule Manager needs at least one Suricata IDS instrument to function. It will manage the Suricata instances that are available.
Rule manager will manage the Zeek instances that are available.
